message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $8250. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings.

I appreciate the effort to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $7500, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Can you consider meeting me at $7500?

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $8000, which is the minimum I'm willing to accept. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings. If you're still not willing to meet me at $8000, I'll have to consider other options.
